trans-unit.source: Animates from the <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value of the previous key frame to its own <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value" /> using linear interpolation.

This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Decimal> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Decimal>根据一组关键帧的属性值。

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧定义的一个段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames>它所属。

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键帧都有一个目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的时间关键帧的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A>应到达。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame> create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: 之类的线性的关键帧<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame>创建值之间的平滑、 线性内插。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" /> class.
Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value.
Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
Key time for the key frame.
The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value and key time.
Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" />.
A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearDecimalKeyFrame" />.
The value to animate from.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
